trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 为派生自的控件提供设计时支持在可视化设计器中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记的描述的控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，则设计时控件是保留到标记源和编辑代码向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: Designers that are derived from the BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生自 BaseDataBoundControlDesigner 抽象基类的设计器为从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>派生的控件提供设计时支持

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造一个派生自的设计器的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>类创建关联的控件的设计图面上时。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，通常将解除挂钩事件从以前的数据源，，然后将新事件附加到新的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the ConnectToDataSource method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: ConnectToDataSource 方法的实现通常涉及与以前的数据源，然后将新事件附加到新的数据源的取下扣事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the old and new data sources are the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果执行与新的数据源的连接，通常;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>旧和新数据源是否相同。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，创建一个新的数据源关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，执行必要的操作以设置派生自的关联控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When you override the DataBind method in a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly.
trans-unit.target: 当你重写派生自的设计器中的数据绑定方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>类中，执行必要的操作以设置数据绑定控件，以便检索设计时标记时，该控件正确呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你会将关联的设计时数据源，而不是实时数据源，出于性能原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> with which this designer is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>与此设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*> property for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>关联控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 数据源属性用于隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>与此设计器关联的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataSource property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 数据源属性的值保存在设计器为基础生成的标记上的数据绑定表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用关联控件的数据绑定表达式派生自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property of the underlying <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>基础属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceID property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceID 属性用于隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>基础属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> associated with the underlying <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>与基础关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, unhooks events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将解除挂钩事件从当前的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref>对象，并可选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法与设计器从所有数据源事件解除挂钩的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 生成用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>类检索用于在设计时呈现控件之前绑定目的的示例数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not data bound, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不是绑定的数据，则会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有错误呈现控件，则会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在设计时呈现控件，控件是否为空或无法检索数据源的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>类检索用于在设计时呈现控件之前绑定目的的示例数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.
trans-unit.target: 空的设计时控件呈现为包含类型名称和控件名称的占位符。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
trans-unit.target: 用于在使用空的数据源的设计时呈现控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在发生错误时的设计时呈现控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误设计时控件呈现为一个占位符，包含的类型名称、 控件名称和描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>所引发。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 用于在发生错误时的设计时呈现控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 准备好使用设计器来呈现从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>派生的控件时，设计器宿主调用 Initialize 方法

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法和其基方法配置属性，并连接所需的设计器操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: A control derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>, which implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>，该类实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: 时调用此方法关联的数据源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>对象更改。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method connects to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 方法连接到当前的数据源。

trans-unit.source: If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的数据源不同于向其控件之前已连接，数据源或`forceUpdateView`是`true`，关联的控件重绘设计图面上。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要强制的设计时标记; 更新否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object loads a new schema.
trans-unit.target: 时调用此方法关联的数据源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>对象加载新架构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>方法将处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>事件，将引发该事件的关联的控件绑定到源数据的架构时更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>方法来执行提供新的架构时所需的其他操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器中用于删除或添加其他属性，以显示在**属性**网格或隐藏关联控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 控件设计器使用派生自的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加或删除属性从**属性**网格。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class, the PreFilterProperties shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>类 PreFilterProperties 阴影<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>的控件属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: It makes a copy of the attribute array of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property.
trans-unit.target: 它使的属性数组的副本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>，然后将这些属性添加到隐藏的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property to `false` unless the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property of the control is already set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它将设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>的隐藏特性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>属性`false`除非<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>的控件的属性已设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the properties to filter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含要筛选的属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], displays a dialog box to assist the user in creating a data source.
trans-unit.target: 在设计宿主中，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，显示一个对话框，以帮助用户创建的数据源。

trans-unit.source: A reference to this designer.
trans-unit.target: 对此设计器的引用。

trans-unit.source: The type of data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable editing of the configuration, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable configuration editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要启用编辑的配置，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>禁用配置编辑。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> object.
